website_summaries.verdict: Expertly formulated compound that softens while it cleans, helping extend the life of leather and numerous leather-like items.
pros: Premium formula from leather experts extends the life of your valuable leathers
Safe, with no harsh chemicals and can also be used on leather-like materials such as durablend, vinyl, compound, and saffiano
Comes with a handy microfiber wiping towel
cons: Relatively high-priced compared to other brands
Some were disappointed that it doesn't completely remove certain old stains or ones from ink/dye-transfer

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Lexol, Griots, Meguires and Chamberlains. This is by FAR the absolute best cleaner I have used. I spent about 30-45 minutes on each seat of my '14 Grand Cherokee with the Napa Leather (Don't ever buy this leather package) and the 3 years of grime came up beautifully, You'll definitely need more towels if you plan on doing anything more than a single vehicle seat but that's not the products fault. Couldn't recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: B Wallace

customer_reviews.title: ... have not seen actually work but based off their good reviews and tried it on my brand new Kate ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy a leather cleaner that I have not seen actually work but based off their good reviews and tried it on my brand new Kate Spade white leather purse I got for Christmas. I actually got a blue denim stain on them from my pants rubbing against the purse while walking and after I applied the cleaner on the cloth they shipped to me as well, it took the blue denim smear right off. I couldn't be happier! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Non-damaging Cleaner (though not an ink remover)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leather cleaner for a very specific purpose: to try to get some ballpoint ink marks out of a leather jacket I was sewing. Pro: this cleaner did not damage the leather or leech any of the dye. Con: it did nothing to remove the ink marks. Fortunately, I discovered that using hairspray removed the ink as desired and then this leather cleaner was the perfect follow-up to get rid of the sticky, corrosive residue left by the hairspray. I contacted TriNova directly for advice about my ink problem and they were both helpful and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: The Readingmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Bad stuff, stained my BMW leather seats
customer_reviews.text: Bad stuff, stained my BMW leather seats.... And no one ever sits in the back seats. I'm not a complainer, but this was $$ and bad.
customer_reviews.author: shugrl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for cleaning leather.  Just buy it.  It works.
customer_reviews.text: I was given an off-white leather recliner by a neighbor that was in need of a good cleaning. Based on the reviews of this TriNova product, I bought it and I agree with the 5 star reviews. It has made the recliner look amazing. I highly recommend this product. It arrives with a very nice white microfiber cloth. It's a good size cloth and it's amazing how well it worked on my recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Tacomapat

customer_reviews.title: Make your leather a treasure!!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought it was a much better idea to clean the leather first NOT clean and condition. You need to remove the dirt and oils THEN condition and protect the leather. This is the best way to prepare the leather. Easy to apply with the included microfiber towel. Very very pleased with the results. I have two cars with full leather interiors. Happy happy joy joy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner. I have a number of lightly colored purses like pink, yellow and beige. I have used this cleaner for those purses without discoloration or patchiness.It just cleans my purses beautifully. I use it withand together, they have kept my purses nice and supple!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff for Sure
customer_reviews.text: Really a super product... I have a little over a year old truck with a leather interior. The leather seats were beginning to dull out. I applied the cleaner per the directions. I was quite surprised to see all the luster come back in the leather. In fact the seats look like new to me.... I recommend this product without hesitation. Once the leather is dry to the touch I am going to put apply a leather conditioner to the seats as well. Conditioners typically add needed oily type lubricants back into the leather. This then prevents cracking as the leather ages....
customer_reviews.author: R. Pendery

customer_reviews.title: I ruined a beautiful Tory Burch bag
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my blush colored purse. Made the color rub off in a spot. I tried it on a spot on the back before use and it did not rub off the color there. Do not use!! I ruined a beautiful Tory Burch bag.
customer_reviews.author: ohmom

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Took the texture right off my leather couch! Followed directions to clean dirt and oil from the top cushion of my sofa and applied to the supplied cloth and used small circles and it stripped the top texture layer off my couch even though I didn't apply any pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Find a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans ok-ish, took a little (very little) surface dirt off some of my leather upholstery, but not very much. Ended up throwing out the rest of the bottle. It smells like a glass cleaner (windex multi-surface to be precise), and I'm a more than a little suspicious that it is actually just a glass cleaner in a different bottle. Not very impressed, I'd jump up a bit in price and find a better quality product from a more well known manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this
customer_reviews.text: So I finally got around to do the project and I am very disappointed how the results turned out. I didn’t expect it to be perfect but I surely did not expect to damage it. Now I have to figure out if this is repairable Diy or I need to get professional help Left one is before I added the product :(
customer_reviews.author: Emin Aljic

customer_reviews.title: Works well but wear gloves & read the SDS
customer_reviews.text: Please read SDS & wear gloves! Label doesn’t identify product ingredients. Product works well but has a noticeable smell that I am familiar with from my industry. After reviewing the SDS, I realized that it contains benzene. Benzene is drying to the skin and is a carcinogen.
customer_reviews.author: T C

customer_reviews.title: Darkens dirt, dulls leather. Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and seeing photos, I decided this leather cleaner was the winner. I bought it to clean a leather watch band. It did not help in the slightest! In fact, it made the dirtiness look even darker! I tried it multiple times on my watch band. This cleaner completely failed. But to be fair I tried it on another item, a leather wallet. On that one, it seemed to remove a *little* of the dirt ... and dulled the luster of the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Had a red stain on my leather ivory car seat. First used Armour-All which got out most of the stain. Was hoping this would get out the rest. Tried it when I received and nothing, even when I used a soft brush, let it soak in for a bit, scrub, etc...no change. I went ahead and tried the Armour-All again and it got the rest of it out. Not sure if this product "loosen" the stain but didn't seem to work at all as the later did; was very watery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: A product that works
customer_reviews.text: Hubby puts his golf bag on the back seat of our car because in the trunk he keeps his foldable golf cart and our car is small. Therefore, our beige leather seat had gotten quite dusty/dirty and I hadn't really noticed it since I never sit back there. Smart of TriNova to include a white microfiber towel, half of which was black after I cleaned the back seat. The back seat looked so good after the cleaning, I did the rest of the car, ha ha. To be fair, I'd not tried any other product before searching on Amazon and purchasing the TriNova cleaner. However, I'm very satisfied and would buy it again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LauraP

customer_reviews.title: Dries out leather and makes it smell bad. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: It really dried out the handbag I cleaned with it, and even after applying the conditioner, the leather did not feel as soft and subtle as before. The sides of the strap are now cracked and dried out, I think due to this cleaner. I didn't both to test there before cleaning. It did not remove ink stains from my leather purse. It has a strong smell, that does not go way. Not for people who are sensitive to chemicals or perfumes. Some reviews said it made their items smell now, but to me it smells more like watermelon than earthy leather.
customer_reviews.author: V. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great products with amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use Chemical Guy and Adams Polishes, but I recently discovered triNova products. The leather cleaner works great. They also sent me a free bottle of leather conditioner which also works amazingly. Recently I got a 40% email discount code. TriNova customer service has contacted me many times making sure I am pleased with the product. Highly recommend trying out TriNova products However on serious stains I’ve found it’s not that great. Had to use CG leather cleaner to get it truly clean
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leather cleaner, 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This leather cleaner is great and worked out perfectly. I needed to clean my steering wheel and this restored it to brand new status. It did not leave any residue or make the steering wheel slippery. I would have to say this product only cleans it did not seem to condition the leather that much, but their are other products for conditioning leather and this works perfectly for what it is supposed to do, it cleans very well. Ps. I did have to use more than one application, but isn't that standard when cleaning very dirty thing?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This cleans everything beautifully. We recently received leather sofas and have young children, I needed something to clean the inevitable “ick” that I find randomly on the furniture. This has worked great! I also cleaned my husband’s leather belts and leather wrapped steering wheel and all were cleaned to near mint condition. I’m looking forward to getting the conditioner to apply after cleaning to really hydrate and make everything shine.
customer_reviews.author: MommaLazer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - saved my favorite handbag!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and a must have for those who have a lot of light color leather in their home! I have a light pink leather purse that got dirty from everyday wear and so far nothing was able to get the stains out. I used this product to wipe it down and in a few minutes the purse looked brand new. I also used it on white and other light color shoes, jackets, and couches with same great result. The spray is colorless and doesn't have a strong chemical smell like many competitor brands. It's not the cheapest product out there BUT you get a huge bottle for the price and this stuff actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Very effective at removing oily stains from leather.
customer_reviews.text: I have a tan leather chair that became stained from suntan lotion. Mild soap solutions didn’t cut through the oil at all. I applied this cleaner as directed and it succeeded in removing the stains on the first try. Using extra pressure with the towel off process seemed to be key. The scent isn’t bad. It does seem to dry out the leather a little so using some leather conditioner afterwards might make sense.
customer_reviews.author: myflightislate

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR PET OWNERS
customer_reviews.text: I have a camel colored leather sofa and two little dogs (12lbs and 35lbs) they occasionally jump on the couch without a blanket down and scratch it a bit. Not only does this product clean the leather but it must condition it as well (to some degree) because it does a great job of remoisturizing my couch where little dog nails have scratched the leather. It also came with a free microfiber cloth!! Maybe I’m a loser who didn’t read the details and missed that part, either way it’s still nice! I’ll definitely repurchase, although it will take me a while to work through the giant bottle I bought, and be looking at their other product offerings! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Mack

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product to clean leather as well as "leatherette" seats in our cars. The seats are light grey so they show a good amount of grime buildup. What i found to be the most helpful trick to get the most out of this product is to use some sort of agitator. I find that this helps clean better then just wiping on, as indicated on the instructions. I'm sure that the level of grime has something to do with this, but so far this product has worked better than Lexol and Armoural. The leather color hasn't been impacted negatively either.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I wore my leather boots to New Orleans for Mardi Gras so they got pretty messy. I used this to clean my boots and they did a good job, no discoloring. The cloth that was provided was nice and gentle, it was about 12'x12' or 15'x15'. I followed up with leather honey leather conditioner and my boots looked gorgeous afterwards! I did brush most of the dirt off with a toothbrush before using the spray as some other people had recommended doing that for best results. If I have any issues with this product in the future I will update my review but this is my first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Monica N.

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Outperforms Other Leather Cleaners, Both Commercial and Homemade
customer_reviews.text: Despite excellent reviews from other purchasers of TriNova Leather Cleaner, there's nothing like trying it for yourself. In my case, I have a large, white leather sofa that had already been treated first with a commercial leather cleaning product and then with a homemade product. It was amazing to see how TriNova removed dirt left by the two previous cleanings that had been employed only days earlier. The white cleaning cloth that comes with TriNova turned dark gray with the dirt left behind by the two other attempts. I am now fully convinced that TriNova is one of the finest leather cleaning products that you can buy and highly recommend it to anyone considering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basically like using water?
customer_reviews.text: This did not clean leather very well at all. I tried it on some water stained boots and a dirt stained shoulder bag. It almost seems like it's just water with fragrance, or a super mild surface cleanser heavily diluted in water. The manufacturer won't list the ingredients. This was so ineffective that I am starting to doubt that the hundreds of positive reviews that influenced me to purchase this are legitimate. It seems like most of the higher ratings were by people that are using this for auto seats or sofas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little cleaner - buy extra towels
customer_reviews.text: TriNova is the first leather cleaner I've used, so I've got nothing to compare to. And I'm going to assume with each product you'll need a good bit of elbow grease to get the job done. With that said, I'm pleased with this cleaner. I coupled it with the hand brush, and I'm not sorry that I did! It's amazing to see how grimy my tan leather car seats actually were, made evident by the clean spots as I made my way. It certainly didn't take the whole bottle, as some other reviewers suggested. Definitely have extra microfiber towels on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Justice to my leather seats (:
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new car recently. The leather seats at the back had some noticeable dirt marks which probably came from those who test driven the car. I like to keep things clean and prolong the leather as much as I can, so I ended up buying this. It was a wise choice by me. It does the job and cleans off the marking effectively. Of course I applied it to a small area at first. Thankfully there was no discoloration or damage to the leather (color red by the way). It made my seats smell fresh again and vibrant in color.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a stain on a cushion. Didn't lighten or phase the stain at all. I wouldn't write a review if that was just the case because I would assume stain was set in. However, I decided to do the stain, and an area around the stain, no difference. Not even a lightening of leather being cleaned around the stain. Chairs are a little over a year old and in formal living room so never get used much but could tell they needed a routine cleaning. Just didn't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lkilgore75

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Leather cleaner did a great job getting all the dirt and stains out of my seats. I will definitely recommend Trinova's products to anyone in search of QUALITY products for their vehicles. Also - they included a free microfiber towel with my order? I don't see anyone else helping out their customers and handing out freebies? Side note, I also like messages attached to the products. Makes me feel like a valued customer and reassures my decision to buy from them
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Koch

customer_reviews.title: How well it helps to preserve leather
customer_reviews.text: I'm in an almost constant search for a product to condition a number of leather items that go with me on all sorts of outdoor activities where they get wet, salty, stained and just plain dirty. I read really good reviews about Trinova leather cleaner and ordered a bottle. So far, it performs as promised. I'll put it to the test later this week fishing offshore -- where everything gets wet and smells like fish at the end of the day. If it makes it through that, I will have found what I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Oldcabdriver

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic bullet, but cleans pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I used this cleaner on some fairly old spots on our leather sofa and loveseat. It did a fairly decent job of cleaning, but didn't get everything off. BUT I suspect it would have worked better had I worked on these spots when they were made. I suspect I waited too long to deal with them. I have another leather cleaner that didn't work work as well as this one and it was supposed to be used with a sponge. The cloth that comes with this cleaner was easier to use and did a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Super bummed.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this on my light grey leather interior, because it has built up some general dinge from sweat/body oils/dirt over the last couple years. I followed the instructions on the bottle with the towel given, and even tried with a different micro fiber cloth I had around, and it didn't make a dent in the grime build-up. I sprayed some directly on the seat and let it sit for a minute before using the micro fiber cloth to work it in circles, but still nothing. There wasn't any difference between the leather before and after I spent 10 minutes trying to scrub. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineD

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: It has an awful stench to it and has no warning about wearing protective gear, but my skin on my hands feels Awful!!!! It’s been a day since I tried cleaning my leather bed frame and the stench has not left my hands ! I’m so worried that this chemical might be harmful but there is zero information, the smell is in my nose and I feel it in my throat, I’m very worried about my health after using this product, I soaked my hands in water with soap for about an hour to see if the smell and feeling on my skin would go away but it does not!
customer_reviews.author: marina solodukho

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got some really bad blue dye on my $300 beige purse as well as on her and my T-shirts. Though she was told it's water washable, it was NOT washed off from our T-shirts. Luckily, with this cleaner, the dye spots on my purse was COMPLETELY removed. I am very impressed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Atmazonix

customer_reviews.title: The best we have found
customer_reviews.text: This product is has done the best at cleaning our leather sofas without leaving any residue behind or causing the leather to dry out. We have used the cleaner in conjunction with the leather polish and our leather couches still look great after many years of heavy use. We also like the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: markpatrickarmstrong

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: My dark denim jeans rub off on my light tan leather car seat and I bought this to remove the stains. It worked pretty well but didn’t completely remove the stains even after working on them for quite a while. Most of the stain was removed and I was fairly pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: No frikn way!!!??  Crushed it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service here is beyond outstanding!!! 1st bottle plastic spray failed miserably, broke on a new bottle n the white plastic ring wouldn’t stay, rendering it almost useless. I emailed customer service and holy sheep dung, someone cares!!! They immediately sent me a replacement bottle ASAP with no blood sample, hair follicles, butt swab required!!! We’re really not use to this quality customer service since 3 people usually care anymore in America: No Bod Ee!! This company crushed it & BONUS: it worked wonders on out leather sectional stains that would not come out!! Kudos to you guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Duck

customer_reviews.title: Saved my purse
customer_reviews.text: I got light colored sunscreen all over one side of my black kate spade purse and was pretty upset that I was having trouble getting it off. I bought this just to see if MAYBE it might work. And it did work! I'm really glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand all the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write bad reviews but I didn't think this worked at all. The smell was not good and it didn't do anything at all. I tried it on my leather couch and on my leather car seat. There was absolutely no luster at all. and didn't clean well either. To me, it was useless. I'm confused because so many others raved about it. I wish I would have tried it right when I got it, because now the return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: LawofAttractionGirl

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The review wouldn't let me leave zero stars. I thought I followed the instructions and spent all Sunday afternoon trying to clean my Frye leather handbag to no avail. I saw some improvement but not much. (I don't know if it matters but the spray cap didn't work; I had to just use the solution out of the bottle onto the microfiber cloth.) I tried to call Customer Service today and got an answering service who suggested I leave a VM message. I don't understand all of these positive reviews. I'll have to search for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove stain
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't remove stain on leather auto seat. I followed the directions using the included cloth along with a leather brush. The stain, which I believe to be from wearing a brown leather belt, could not be removed. I'll try another product; this one didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: mboling

customer_reviews.title: Best leather handbag cleaner I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I am starting a new venture on restoring my leather, bags. Needless to say this product didn't let me down. It completely restored a well needed deep cleaning bag restored and cleaned it back to life. Used it on a Dooney&Burke bag and absolutely no damage. IT CLEANED & CONDITIONED the bag. Not like the store cleaner that only really conditioned it. It works like a charm. Will definitely buy again. Heres a tip: Don't spray directly on you handbags always apply to a micro cloth.
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing leather cleaner. I used it on our big diesel truck with leather seats and it looked immaculate, like brand new leather. This seller is extremely accommodating, the product arrived well packaged and I wouldn't hesitate to buy this product again because it lives up to all expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Meek

customer_reviews.title: Great leather cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Product work great in conjunction with a bristle brush to clean white leather. Very light formula and seemed to hydrate the leather and left it softer, cleaner and more vibrant. No scents mean less ingredients/chemicals that would be left behind on the leather. All it had was a very mild soapy scent to it that dissipates after clean up. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Dob

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Been using this companies leather cleaner which absolutely rocks, and I needed a marble cleaner for our shower. So I was on forms and found this to be the one everyone talked about so I ordered it up. Got home, started spraying away and was wowed by how it took the ugly film I had on there from installation off. The wife walks in and she couldn't believe how much it made the marble pop as oppose to another big box branded stores cleaner for a higher price. Highly recommend this product, can't wait to find a need for their other products to try them all out!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Dirt is removed.
customer_reviews.text: My recliner hasn't been cleaned for some time. I used Trinova Leather Cleaner on the leather and was amazed at the amount of dirt that was removed. Especially on the chair arms. The chair color is black so the dirt doesn't show. But the provided cleaning cloth is white which shows how much dirt was removed. The container has enough solution for many cleanings.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce  A

customer_reviews.title: Good but not always effective on different types of leather.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the TriNova cleaner to clean and condition a leather chair and ottoman much abused by small children and neglect. The results were very good: the leather became more supple and its original darkness was restored. Emboldened by first success, I tried TriNova on a leather loveseat. My efforts were not rewarded as well as the sofa leather did not regain original color or soften. Plan to try again. Good product but its performance is not universally successful in my early uses of it.
customer_reviews.author: R. SKINNER

customer_reviews.title: Solution works - but it does take time.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner worked very well on our leather couch - removing deep grime. I had given up on it, thinking that the dirt wouldn't come out - but it did! I don't know if we used it correctly, as it took a couple of days after the treatment for for the dirt to come out (wiped it off initially but wiped it off a couple more times afterward and the dirt just kept coming out). Will buy it again and this time, will make sure we let it soak for the coplete time recommended and will buy the conditioner too. Looking forward to even better results!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my leather chair
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my high quality leather chair. The chair had a grease stain from a man’s bald head, so I tried the cleaner on the grease stain. I sprayed the cleaner on the rag and gently wiped the stain. It appeared to remove the stain, so I gently went over it again. Then I noticed it was actually removing the leather! The leather was crumbling and falling off. So frustrated with this product - definitely NOT SAFE for leather!
customer_reviews.author: Rockwood Mom

customer_reviews.title: I had never even heard of it but it was great!!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried everything to get an ordor of fish out of my faux leather seat in the rear of my SUV and in the process the Febreeze had left spots -- it seemed like hundreds on a black seat and the smell was still present. I ordered Trinova and gave it a try !!! I almost cried I was so shocked and surprised!! It looked brand new -no more spots and guest what the bonus was "NO SMELL"
customer_reviews.author: S Wels

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my white leather purse with ease!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super late review considering I bought this almost a year ago, but I had to come back and give a good rating. I noticed a large black mark on my white leather purse today and was scared that it would be permanent. I remembered I had bought this leather cleaner last December specifically to clean my purse and dug it out to try it. To my relief and excitement, the black mark came off easily. I really, really recommend this for any leather purse owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I've always cleaned my leather furniture with a damp rag. It seemed to work just fine. But then I went after some stains on my truck's leather seats and bought a bottle of Trinova. The Trinova did an excellent job of removing those marks, so I tried it on the furniture. I'm embarrassed to say how much filth I removed. It is so much better than a damp rag, and I'm sold. I have a bottle come every six months on Amazon's subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Feenstra

customer_reviews.title: Read My Review (UPDATED)
customer_reviews.text: It Does the Job But it doesn’t quietly make it bright or shinning, but is okay for regular clean out . UPDATE: I Wasn’t Happy At First With this Product and Tro Nova Customer Read My Review and they took it in Concern. (THEY SENT ME A LEATHER BRUSH) Which Help To Clean My Leather Seat and Door a Little More Better. I Would Recommend it now.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmi Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Cleanes well!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner! Our truck was filthy from living on a dirt road... this took all the sirt of easily. I was surprised. I am very happy with hour our leather interrior came clean. I also cleaned some very dirty boots, it didn't take out the deep stains... but cleaned it well!! Need to condition dry leathers after, as this doesn't condition and I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: EarthBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the leather feeling good after and the car smells good
customer_reviews.text: used it on my Audi A5 and my friends Mercedes cla along with some Lexol conditioner and I absolutely love it. Not only does it give the leather a nice matte natural look unlike those cheap car wash places that make the leather look reflective, but it also gave it a nice smell after. Got tons of positive comments on how the car smelled "like a new car" although its not exactly new car smell to me but definitely the closest i have gotten and still a great smell. 5/5 from me
customer_reviews.author: Xavier gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew about this stuff a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - I love this stuff! Cleans well (just like the reviews stated). I cleaned my car with a typical car vinyl cleaner and used this stuff the very next day (just to see if I noticed a difference). I couldn't believe how much dirt came up (even though I just cleaned the car). It doesn't have a greasy feel. This is my new goto!
customer_reviews.author: kbrenner

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely worth a shot
customer_reviews.text: I had blue paint on my black leather seats. At first I was frustrated because I expected it to come off immediately after applying but I saw another customer let it sit for 5-7 min and then scrub with nail cleaner and it worked!!! I couldn’t have been happier. That stain was on there for years and this was my last hope. I’m still trying to work through other less noticeable marks which I’m having a harder time with but it took care of the main one I was concerned about.
customer_reviews.author: Elsy

customer_reviews.title: Heart Leather Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leather cleaner I have used. Be careful not to scrub too hard, I have a few spots on a white leather chair which started to remove coloring, not really noticable but it's there. It cleaned almost all dirt but didn't remove the red dye transfer from clothing. Be very careful if you have leather that has been repaired/repainted, I believe it would remove the coloring.
customer_reviews.author: kelly reed

customer_reviews.title: Works magic in revitalizing dry or even slightly cracked surface scratches from large dogs, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly to clean and condition my nice grey-tan colored large leather sectional that gets surface scratched and surface dirt on it from our two 80 pound crazy happy pups. One good wipedown and the entire couch looks completely revitalized and healthy again! It also seems to keep conditioned and stay moisturized for longer after it's been rubbed deeply in everyehere, acting as a sort of preventative against any future bad scratches that would likely have otherwise caused irrevocable damage. Difference is night and day!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Removes stains, safe to use
customer_reviews.text: Works just as stated and removes most dirt on first attempt. For tougher stains, you might have to repeat twice. Wish it didn't have such a strong smell to it...almost nauseating.
customer_reviews.author: Tegi

customer_reviews.title: Seems like always plenty of stuff for cleaning your windows and ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like always plenty of stuff for cleaning your windows and dash but not so much for the leather seats. This had very good ratings on Amazon and it works very well. Spray bottle version is nice. Smell is very nice from freshly cleaned but not too strong. My wife doesn't like a lot of strong scents if those scents are normally very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rick from Mission Konnect

customer_reviews.title: but what I was able to use I have really enjoyed. I use it my seats and interior in ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little upset when the product arrived leaking, but Im guessing its from the carrier tossing it on the porch. Lost about a half bottles worth, but what I was able to use I have really enjoyed. I use it my seats and interior in my Ford Raptor, and it does a great job taking daily grime out, and leaving the leather feeling great and smelling good. I haven't gotten enough use out of it to really give a solid review, but off to a decent start.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Millhollin

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually review products as I am very skeptical of product claims, however I had to do this review because the stuff does work! This is the third product I have used to get rid of stubborn stains on a piece of tan leather luggage i own. I tried the others, and to my disappointment, could not get the stains out. This product comes with a microfiber towel that worked well in scrubbing the stain. To make a long story short, the stain has faded significantly, and I think with repeated applications can get it out. Try this product first before you spend money on other ones that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ilia

customer_reviews.title: It does a greT job, even on very light colored leather with no damage
customer_reviews.text: My sofas are cream colored and so dirt really shows. After using the leather cleaner, the sofas were real cream again. I used the enclosed cloth which did a good job but was labor intensive. I then used an extremely soft brush who did not hurt the leather and did a fantastic job. I will definitely use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Reading

customer_reviews.title: cleans leather with very little effort, looks new again
customer_reviews.text: i have two ivory colored leather coaches. i have pets and grand children. i used the leather cleaner on the coaches and it was amazing the way the dirt loosened and wiped off! removed the dirt from 2 and 1/2 years of remodeling, pets and grand kids that play outside in dirt that is reddish clay. i also cleaned 2 leather kate spade purses. they look brand new! i used the enclosed microfiber cloth to apply and a small soft leather cleaning brush. do not hesitate to buy this leathering CLEANING product. cleaned up fast and easy for this grandma. just rub on the cleaner, use the brush as needed, and wipe it off, done.
customer_reviews.author: Linda V.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing! I thought for sure my Designer Blvgari powder blue handbag was ruined by a dirt stain. The stain looked like it was caused by rubbing up against my navy blue faux leather suede jacket. This product got it out and made my handbag brand new again! Love it and will continue to use it on all my leather products.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Sahasrabuddhe

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Bought together with the conditioner and I’m not very happy with the product. Also came with a sticker to get another bottle for free which is how I assume this product has so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Eva A.

customer_reviews.title: Warning on bottle
customer_reviews.text: Description says this is safe. Bottle says otherwise. I wish the back was shown in the pictures. Was planning to use on a couch that me, my pets, my family use.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleBugs

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! This stuff works better than described... I have a pitbull terrier who likes to have a slob running from her mouth like Niagara Falls, this cleaner removes it without a trace on leather furniture! If you’ve got a dog that likes to make a mess this is the product you need!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I just got a new car with light cream color leather and my jeans leave blue shade on the seats. The cleaner will remove 90% of the blue color from the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think it gets smells out like smoke as my steering wheel smells like smoke from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the strong reviews and I was out of my Zymol leather cleaner that I’ve had for almost 10yrs. I will say I am impressed that I used this on a already “cleaned” leather steering wheel and it still lifted a ton of dirt from it. I don’t think it gets smells out like smoke as my steering wheel smells like smoke from the previous owner. But it doesn’t advertise that it will. I have yet to use it through out my cars so I’ll update when I get to that. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mr H

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: I did my leather office chair and my living room chair. It left both looking very nice It's not any different than most spray on products but I can say this worked well leaving the older leather looking nice. I thought the smell was a little strong but the living room chair is not small so I really can't complain about that either
customer_reviews.author: R. Reimler

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy to use cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Just spray it on, work it in and shortly thereafter, wipe it off. We used the small leather brush that Trinova sells to work the product into the leather. The entire process was quick and easy. The leather was noticeably cleaner and felt better.
customer_reviews.author: DaveJ

customer_reviews.title: Use with Confidence
customer_reviews.text: I used TriNova Leather Cleaner on a belting leather satchel that I have had for over ten years. The cleaner worked perfectly removing the grime and dirt built up over years of everyday use. The cleaner did not change the color of the leather, neither darkening or lightening it. I highly recommend TriNova Leather Cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zaberto

customer_reviews.title: Didn't remove denim stain from leather car seat
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. I was really hoping this would be the product that would finally remove the denim stains from my cream leather car seat. I followed the directions and it faded the stain very slightly, but it's still present. After 20 minutes of circular rubbing the stain is still there. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Clean, shiny and supple new!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had a product that cleaned leather as well as this product. My cream colored leather couch sat in an area near the screen door facing the west sun. As you can imagine, the leather got dusty/dirty at times and a little dry. The scrub brush (separate Trinova product) also made the cleaning process a lot easier. The conditioner was better than expected. It basically "melted" into the leather making it look shiny and supple new.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new car
customer_reviews.text: "This worked perfectly for my car's interior upholstery! I just bought a new car with black leather seats and want to take good care of them, so i did some research and kept seeing this product pop up in reviews. The spray-on application was super helpful, and the included microfiber cloth made it that much easier to use."
customer_reviews.author: Austin D.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted a six-year-old white leather purse. The person did not have it cleaned prior. So I bought this hoping to get as close to a restoration as possible because the purse is white. After one cleaning, it is considerably brighter and I think it may only need one more to be fully brightened back to white.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a big difference to have the brush. I spray directly onto my cream couch and use brush to get in between the wrinkles. Without the brush, it takes too much elbow grease to get the dirt out of it. I like the results and will continue to purchase this product. The product has no scent. My picture is one of before and one after
customer_reviews.author: Retrievers Rock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Will definitely purchase again and would recommend it. Also the sell is quick to ship and if there are any problems will resolve it professionally and immediately to the buyers complete satisfaction. I know because I had a small issue and it was resolved and I am extremely happy. Plus it is an all around great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Leather Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems like a good product. I searched for hours and tried a couple of others when the product I used to use was no longer available for purchase. I really like the conditioner and just wish you could get larger bottles/more product for the price. These items don't seem to bother my lungs as many of the other products out there do.
customer_reviews.author: phxascent

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: After trying this, I'm not sure you will use anything else to clean your leather products with. Please note that this was used on 100% real leather couch. It was not a Faux, Vinyl, or Leatherette type of material. I have yet to try this product on those materials. I do plan on using it on my Malibu at some point to see how it does there. I'd guess those are Faux Leather.
customer_reviews.author: Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: After using two other top rated leather cleaner's that didn't perform well on my light colored leather car seats, I tried this product and it outperformed the others removing the dye that transferred from my expensive jeans onto the driver's seat. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good but follow the instruction on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I think I like it -- I used it to clean our sofa which is a genuine leather sofa. One thing I notice is that the leather cleaning is probably a little too strong so do not spray directly on the leather surface, when I did on my sofa I noticed that the portion of the leather started to fade -- however as per directions if you spray on the cloth provided with it and use it to clean it works great -- so READ the instructions before using the product ..
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu

customer_reviews.title: Removed kid dirt from light leather auto seat
customer_reviews.text: Removed black kid grime from dirty shoes and oily hands off of light gray leather car seats in my new Sonata. It's a softer textured leather and per my research this one would clean and not darken the light leather. Everything came clean easily. I used the included microfiber towel. I also bought the conditioner but I haven't tried it yet. Didn't think to get a before pic but here are the seats.
customer_reviews.author: libertymarie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this out for the first time. We have beige leather in our car, so it gets discolored from denim pants easily. This product seemed to work pretty well and clearly removed some dirt as the white cloth was dingy brown when I was done cleaning. It removed what looked like a blue ballpoint pen spot very easily, but took a lot more elbow grease on the discolored areas of the front seats. I will try with a leather brush next time to see if that improves the performance. I think regular use of this product will be necessary to keep my leather beige.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy H

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this on two different leather items. It did not even lighten the stain on either item. On one item, it actually removed the color from my high end hand bag, but the stain remained unchanged. I wish I still had the original packaging, so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Black stains on White leather handbag
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try and remove stains on my white leather handbag, caused by rubbing against my black jeans. I followed the instructions and worked on half the bag first to see if the black layer of stains would come off. The best way to explain the results is that the layer of stains from the black dye is less noticeable, but it didn’t remove all of the layer.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my leather seats but not to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean the gray leather of a 2003 BMW 330i. I also purchased the leather cleaning brush. I was expecting to see the original color return but that was not the case. It was cleaner but it took 2 passes so maybe my expectations were to high or it requires another attempt. I'd rate the product 3.5 our of 5 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Makes vintage leathers look wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: "After reading the Amazon reviews, I purchased the Trinova Leather Cleaner. I resell pre-owned items on eBay and Etsy. Some of these items are vintage....meaning, they are fabulous finds, but need some sprucing up before they can be photographed and offered to the world. This product gives old, tired leather new life! Seriously! Cleans and gives it that wonderful vintage supple look I love. Glad I found it and trusted the other reviewers."
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cepress

customer_reviews.title: Used Many Others -- this is Simply the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many other products to clean my 2012 Sequoia leather seats with little effect. This product rocks. First seat cleaned the towel went from white to brown. This stuff is amazing. I am going to order the leather conditioner next! Definite must!!
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this product to work as advertised...it did not. It will remove surface debris it wiil not get rid of the water stains or any other stain for which it was intended. It may however work as a preservative, only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works but...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works but i guess it varies on the type of leather and how long the stain has been their. It worked great on the purse pics i posted. It was a blue jeans stain and it had been on the purse for 3 weeks now and took it away by 98%. On one of my other purses it didnt work so well maybe 30% but also the stain had probably been on the purse for close to a year. Also a blue jeans stain.
customer_reviews.author: redflower

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this on three different leather items (two purses and shoes) and it did nothing. I wanted it to work, I needed it to work but it did not come through. They were not big stains or dirty spots, one was dye from my jeans rubbing up against the leather purse, it didn't come out. Another small spot on a purse looked as if it could have been oil or grease, it also didn't come out.
customer_reviews.author: Boopie

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: So it would probably get 2.5 stars as it did not ruin the leather but I can’t give half a star. It did not stain any of the leather products: belt, shoes, LV purse. But did it clean: nope. It removed no stains or dirt, at least no more than wiping down with, ohh the fear, a damp to dry towel. Seriously its not worth the cost and it will just be another chemical lying around in your house. On the plus side, it came with a cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on my car seats. I have a newer car with light grey leather seats , and I noticed the dye from my black pants has been transferring to edge of the seat when I sit. This product removed that dye in seconds and didn't take any original color from the seat at all. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kika

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wish I took before and after photos, I’ve had the same leather couches for almost 12 years now, and you can imagine what it’s been through, just one coat brought so much life back to them! I ended up useing this cleaner on any leather item i could find in my house! I would recommend doing more coats over a period of time to keep the shine up, but honestly impressed with the results. Even better, I used this in my 2005 Acura MDX that had gone though a previous family with younger children, woudlnt even have guessed they ever sat in the car! Helped soooo much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well without stripping/drying too much
customer_reviews.text: Strikes a good balance between working to get out the dirt while not being too hard on the leather. Some products don't clean, some dry and crack the leather more than they should. This one does the former without much of the latter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert_in_Chicago

product_meta.title: TriNova Leather Cleaner for Couch, Car Interior, Bags, Jackets, Saddles. Safe for use in Home or Car, Microfiber Included 18oz
feature_bullets: ☑️ Safe for many surfaces - Will also work on durablend, vinyl, compound, saffiano, faux and other leather or leather-like surfaces.
☑️ Easy to use - simply spray on and wipe off to eliminate almost any surface stain and give new life to your leather.
☑️ Effective and Safe - Works to remove dirt, debris, stains, and grime without using harsh chemicals.
☑️ Premium Formula - Developed by leather experts to deliver top quality results.
☑️ Extend the Life of Your Leather - Routine cleaning and conditioning can help quality leather goods to last a lifetime

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,166 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
